title: THOSE INVOLVED IN THUGGERY CAN BRING NO GLORY, SAYS SARATH FONSEKA
content: The deliberations scheduled to be held by a panel of five Supreme Court judges on whether or not the court martial is a court established through the Constitution, which was scheduled for yesterday, has been postponed for the 9th of this month. Accordingly, former Army Commander Sarath Fonseka, arrived in court….
